roleset.name: damage slightly

example.name: just transitive
example.text: [The federal response to California's earthquake crisis]-1 was marred [*-1] by coast-to-coast name-calling between the White House and San Francisco's Mayor Art Agnos.
example.arg: by coast-to-coast name-calling between the White House and San Francisco's Mayor Art Agnos

example.name: with instrument
example.text: John marred the finish on Mary's dining-room table with his muddy hobnailed boots.
example.arg: the finish on Mary's dining-room table

roleset.note: Only use arg2 when arg0 is also present.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'mar' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry, Framenet entry Damaging.
